00031 #include "chipstream/AnalysisStreamGType.h"
00032 
00033 inline QuantGTypeMethod *AnalysisStreamGType::getQuantGTypeMethod() {
00034   return m_QGTypeMethod; 
00035 }
00036 
00037 /** 
00038  * Set the object for summarizing an individual probe set.
00039  * @param qMethod - Quantification object.
00040  */
00041 void AnalysisStreamGType::setQuantMethod(QuantMethod *qMethod) {
00042   QuantGTypeMethod *gMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantGTypeMethod *>(qMethod);
00043   if(gMethod == NULL)
00044     Err::errAbort("AnalysisStreamGType::setQuantMethod() - Can only set QuantGTypeMethods in AnalysisStreamGType.");
00045   m_QMethod = gMethod;
00046   m_QGTypeMethod = gMethod;
00047 }

00051  * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00052  */
00053 void AnalysisStreamGType::setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00054   doc.setDocName("geno");
00055   doc.setDocDescription("Does genotype calls on probesets.");
00056 }
